Title: Reporting for Duty
Description:
I've only read of the djaradin in books.

Ancient rivals to the dragons, powerful giants with mastery over earth and lava... dedicated wholly to hunting dragons to extinction.

<Sendrax furrows her brow at the distant volcano.>

My instructor said that they hadn't been seen since the dragons left as they slumbered deep in the earth.

If they've awoken, every whelpling on the isles is in danger!

Follow me, I'll take us to Commander Lethanak at the Dragonheart Outpost.
ObjectivesText: Follow Sendrax to the Dragonheart Outpost.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Commander Lethanak at Dragonheart Outpost.
RewardText:
I will take what reinforcements I can get.

We must act swiftly.

Objectives.Text: Ask Sendrax to lead you to the outpost
